main_definition: to do something in a brief or soon time period, often referring to an action that will be taken shortly or after a short delay.

meanings_and_examples.example: The company plans to release its new product shortly, possibly within the next month.
He gave a summary of the event shortly before it ended.

meanings_and_examples.definition: in a short time after speaking
meanings_and_examples.example: She will shortly address your concerns following this meeting.
The manager asked the employee to briefly report back with an update immediately.
